articles.author: MOGOMOTSI MAGOME Associated Press, GERALD IMRAY Associated Press
articles.title: 78 dead at abandoned South Africa gold mine that was scene of a standoff. Toll is expected to rise - ABC News
articles.description: Rescuers and volunteers have pulled at least 78 dead miners and more than 160 survivors from an abandoned South African gold mine
articles.content: STILFONTEIN, South Africa -- Rescuers and volunteers have pulled at least 78 dead miners and more than 160 survivors from an abandoned South African gold mine, where they have languished for over two… [+5746 chars]
